metadata.dcterms:title: Research Data Management Survey, University of Lethbridge
metadata.dcterms:creator: Stevens, Rhys
Scott, Emma
Malacrida, Claudia
Ayers, Sheilah
metadata.dcterms:description: In October, 2018 the University of Lethbridge Library conducted a Research Data Management (RDM) survey of faculty, post-docs and graduate students in collaboration with the University's Office of Research and Innovation Services (ORIS). The survey contained locally customized versions of three generic survey instruments provided by the Portage Canadian RDM Survey Consortium. They were: (1) Engineering and Science RDM Survey; (2) RDM Survey Health and Medical Sciences, and; (3) RDM Survey for Humanities and Social Sciences.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Arts and Humanities
Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
